prompt_base: raw photo, cinematic film still, portrait of a (muscular American air force major:1.2), iconic blonde flat-top haircut, determined grim expression, 8k uhd
feature_prompt: sharp focus on hair texture, weathered skin, (faded tattoo ink on shoulder:1.1), source palette preservation, identical color matching, (matching ribbed tank top fabric:1.2), subtle sweat, film grain
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic, smooth hair, helmet, flat lighting, low quality, deformed tattoo, (thin build:1.3), messy hair, long hair, soft expression, doll
